description:
This product GTTS-WQ293MR is a type of mRNA having 30 nt poly(A) tail and modified with Cap 0 & 5-Methyl-CTP. It ecodes the monoclonal antibody that targets CD37 gene. The antibody can be applied in research.

name: IVTScripTM mRNA Anti CD37
